meeting_info.organization: Downtown Dallas Development Authority Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call meeting to order and declare a quorum is established.
Motion for Chair to preside over the Special Called Meeting.
Public comments pertaining to agenda items 5 through 10.
Review and consider the Meeting Record of the August 29, 2024 special called joint meeting.
agenda_items.description: Review and consider the Meeting Record of the August 29, 2024 special called joint meeting of the Downtown Connection TIF District Board of Directors and the Downtown Dallas Development Authority Board of Directors.

agenda_items.title: Review and consider the Meeting Record of the November 19, 2024 special called meeting.
agenda_items.description: Review and consider the Meeting Record of the November 19, 2024 special called meeting of the City Center TIF District Board of Directors.

agenda_items.title: Review and consider an extension of all project deadlines.
agenda_items.description: Review and consider an extension of all project deadlines previously authorized by City Council Resolution No. 21-1147 on June 23, 2021, and previously extended by 12-months on September 26, 2022 for the Phase 2 expansion of Klyde Warren Park project.
agenda_items.action_required: Approve and forward a recommendation of approval to City Council

agenda_items.title: Review and consider the Downtown Connection TIF District Annual Report for FY 2023-2024.
agenda_items.action_required: Approve and forward a recommendation of approval to City Council

agenda_items.title: Review and consider the City Center TIF District Annual Report for FY 2023-2024.
agenda_items.action_required: Approve and forward a recommendation of approval to City Council

agenda_items.title: Review and consider a quarterly joint meeting schedule for the City Center TIF District Board of Directors.
